Sentencas: The aim of this study is to elucidate the transient behavior of thermodynamic variables in a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) upon electrical load change, which can be used for optimizing cell microstructure and developing a reliable SOFC stack design.
Titulo: Three-dimensional dynamic modeling and transport analysis of solid oxide fuel cells under electrical load change

Sentencas: To overcome the insufficient durability and large performance degradation, SOFC technologies still need reliable cell microstructure and stack design prior to their market deployment.
Titulo: Three-dimensional dynamic modeling and transport analysis of solid oxide fuel cells under electrical load change

Sentencas: This is of significant concerns when considering actual operating conditions, in particular, sudden and severe electrical load change.
Titulo: Three-dimensional dynamic modeling and transport analysis of solid oxide fuel cells under electrical load change

Sentencas: Enhancing the dynamic stability of SOFC is essential to improve its durability under the electrical load change.
Titulo: Three-dimensional dynamic modeling and transport analysis of solid oxide fuel cells under electrical load change

Sentencas: To meet the needs, the local thermodynamic state and thermo-fluid environment should be examined in detail, which requires high-fidelity numerical simulations.
Titulo: Three-dimensional dynamic modeling and transport analysis of solid oxide fuel cells under electrical load change

Sentencas: In this study, a physical model is developed to resolve temporally and spatially reactions and transport phenomena taking place inside planar, anode-supported SOFC stacks.
Titulo: Three-dimensional dynamic modeling and transport analysis of solid oxide fuel cells under electrical load change

Sentencas: The model is validated by using in-house experimental measurements of a current response profile upon electrical load change.
Titulo: Three-dimensional dynamic modeling and transport analysis of solid oxide fuel cells under electrical load change

Sentencas: Then, the dynamic response of thermodynamic variables upon electrical load change is investigated by assuming potentiodynamic conditions.
Titulo: Three-dimensional dynamic modeling and transport analysis of solid oxide fuel cells under electrical load change

Sentencas: The results of this study show that the electrical current responds excessively to the potential steps and recovers its magnitude asymptotically to the quasi-steady state.
Titulo: Three-dimensional dynamic modeling and transport analysis of solid oxide fuel cells under electrical load change

Sentencas: A relaxation time is needed for its dynamic response and recovery.
Titulo: Three-dimensional dynamic modeling and transport analysis of solid oxide fuel cells under electrical load change

Sentencas: This is explained by the time-dependent variation of the electrochemical reaction zone and species transport in the anode.
Titulo: Three-dimensional dynamic modeling and transport analysis of solid oxide fuel cells under electrical load change

Sentencas: The former reacts quickly to electrical load change, influencing the hydrogen concentration, while the latter shows time-delay, affecting the diffusion of hydrogen between the reaction zone and fuel channel.
Titulo: Three-dimensional dynamic modeling and transport analysis of solid oxide fuel cells under electrical load change

Sentencas: The time-delay required for the response of hydrogen diffusion corresponds to the relaxation time needed for the electrical current response.
Titulo: Three-dimensional dynamic modeling and transport analysis of solid oxide fuel cells under electrical load change

Sentencas: These results indicate that the overall transient behavior is predominantly governed by species diffusion in the anode.
Titulo: Three-dimensional dynamic modeling and transport analysis of solid oxide fuel cells under electrical load change

Sentencas: The pressure field also shows similar trend of time-dependent variations, whereas the temperature does not change as much as other variables, implying that it needs much longer time to adjust itself to a new operating condition.
Titulo: Three-dimensional dynamic modeling and transport analysis of solid oxide fuel cells under electrical load change
